rows.label: qst701901_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, dear...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0002
rows.name: What am I to do...?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0003
rows.name: Is something wrong?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0004
rows.name:
Laura-sama? And Adel-sama...
and Hugo-sama...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0005
rows.name:
If it's not too much trouble, would
you mind listening to my story?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0006
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0007
rows.name: My daughter, Freja, is very ill.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0008
rows.name:
Wotta-san offered us a place on his
Divine Beast ship, but I fear she's
too frail for a sea voyage.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0009
rows.name:
She doesn't even have the strength
to make it to the port...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0010
rows.name:
And Fred-san invited us to shelter
in the basement of his inn, but...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0011
rows.name:
Crowded places and stale
air are no good for her...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0012
rows.name:
So... I don't know how I'm
supposed to protect her...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0013
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0014
rows.name:
I want to just say "Don't
worry, we'll win!" but I
know it's not that simple...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0015
rows.name:
It is a parent's nature to
want to prepare for the worst
for their child's sake.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0016
rows.name: Freja-chan! I finally made it!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0017
rows.name: Made... what?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0018
rows.name:
Medicine! Medicine to make
your sickness go away!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0019
rows.name:
I worked really, really
hard to make it!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0020
rows.name:
It's a special remedy made by collecting
100 Dannagh Wetas and extracting one
drop of essence from each!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0021
rows.name: A Dannagh Weta?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0022
rows.name:
It's a rare insect from
the Dannagh Desert!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0023
rows.name: Bugs are gross!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0024
rows.name:
But if you drink Marco's
medicine, you can come and
play outside with us.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0025
rows.name: Please, just try a little bit!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0027
rows.name: Okay...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0028
rows.name: *gulp*...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0029
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Blech!!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0030
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Whoa!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0031
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Freja-chan spat it out!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0032
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Aww, was it that nasty?!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0034
rows.name:
They're very good children. They're
always so concerned about Freja.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0035
rows.name: Isn't there anything we can do?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0036
rows.name: ...According to my diary...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0037
rows.name:
It seems a panacea known as Dragon
Incense exists in Invidia.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0038
rows.name:
It was once used to save a queen
from an incurable disease.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0039
rows.name: I have heard of it as well.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0040
rows.name: Why don't we try to find it?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0041
rows.name: I believe that is our best option.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0042
rows.name: Everyone...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0043
rows.name:
However, isn't Invidia quite
a long way from here...?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0044
rows.name: Indeed it is.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0045
rows.name:
And we can't afford to leave
Metsu unattended right now.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0046
rows.name: You're right...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0047
rows.name:
But, fortunately for us, we
also have reliable allies.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0048
rows.name:
Let's return to Aletta and
consult with Veronica.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0049
rows.name: An excellent idea, Adel-sama.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0050
rows.name:
I'm sure there are plenty of people
in the resistance who would help.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0051
rows.name: Then let's be on our way.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0052
rows.name:
Marena-san, this might take a
little while, but please don't
worry. Just wait for us.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0053
rows.name: I will...! Thank you so much!
